title: Unable to connect to queue after new patch?
body:
For some reason I can't connect to login queue on my laptop although I can login on my computer which I can't access at the moment (hence laptop.) Everytime I try to login it pops up with the error "Unable to connect to login queue."

Trouble shooting steps I have taken : 
1. Repairing Client 
2. Restarting laptop 
3. Confirming IE is up to date 
4. Attempted to use Hextech Repair Tool but I don't have the option to run as admin 
5. All troubleshooting steps that the help page has offered. 
6. Switching to NA and back

Not sure what the problem is as I literally just used this less that 12 hours ago on a friends computer when I was at his house yesterday?

Possibly it's the new patch as yesterday the patch was not out yet.

UPDATE #1 : I successfully ran the Hextech Repair Tool (found where to run as admin) and tried to repatch and reinstall - both resulting in the same ending so I'm still stuck :( .

replies.body: Hey all - we're tracking this issue in [this thread over here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GNIFyg6h-login-issues-july-13th) where we'll be giving updates. We've also got a set of instructions to help us troubleshoot the problem - please check out[ this comment ](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GNIFyg6h-login-issues-july-13th?comment=0006) - it'll help us get this resolved faster!
I am on Telstra so every 1 here with the issue on telstra as well ?
Someone from NZ on Spark was having the same problem so it can't be Telstra. Today is the big fight for net neutrality though so maybe that hsa something to do with it?
I'm on spark too, not working for me either
Yeah, im on spark as well. Same issue
Same :( T______T

I'm in the same boat. 

Have been trying for around an hour now with no luck
Have you tried reinstalling? I'm about to try, I'll update this post later when I've finished.
Reinstalling didn't work either. I think I'll just wait it out until tomorrow
Doing the same thing now. Hopefully it works.

This was in another thread 33 minutes ago

> Hi folks - thanks for reporting.  We're checking into this one now.  Stand by!
same, tried logging into NA doesn't work either

Yep, in the same boat as well. Honestly sucks, been away for a while and I wanted to jam some games. Too bad I caN'T LOG IN DAMN IT

Edit: I'm on Spark NZ here.
3 hours someone please respond..
Imma say the same just so we can all feel sad together. I have the same problem and I have made a post about it
haha let us suffer together or... PUBG looks good too :P

I just started having the same issue. hextech repair tool has been a oxymoron, kinda like windows works.
I've reinstalled with no luck.

Has anyone turned their vpn on and tried logging into the client? Thinking it could be a telstra routing issue

My brother and I are having the same issue too, we're using a Telstra network and we're both have tried all the steps to fixing it by riot

On the help page it sends you too, notice how its dated today. must have predicted such catastrophic failures. *goes and plays another game not belonging to riots ip*
